title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - There is an issue with the Navigator where the option to open/close a project is not always available. When selecting both P1 and P2, the issue occurs.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the option to open/close a project is not always available in the Navigator.
EB: Either both the open and close project options should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2 and close it.
